# Juan Stoppa - Technical Blog

> A technical blog by Juan Stoppa focusing on AI implementation, LLM development, and practical software engineering tutorials.

## About

Juan Stoppa is a software engineer based in the UK who writes hands-on technical guides about artificial intelligence and modern development practices. The content focuses on practical implementation rather than theory, with working code examples.

## Primary Topics

### Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- How to create MCP servers for LLM context
- How MCP servers work in Claude and Cursor
- Practical MCP implementation guides

### LLM Development & Integration
- Getting started with OpenAI APIs in Python
- Azure OpenAI setup and configuration
- RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) implementation
- Text embeddings and vector search
- LangChain and LangGraph for AI agents
- Database querying with AI using LangChain

### AI-Assisted Development
- Pair programming with Claude 3.5 Sonnet
- Using Cursor IDE with Claude
- ChatGPT Canvas for development
- Comparing ChatGPT and Claude for coding tasks

### Practical AI Applications
- Voice-to-PDF document generation using Claude API
- GPT Vision API for image and video analysis
- FastAPI deployment on IIS for Python APIs

### Open Banking
- What is Open Banking and how it works
- Open Banking API demonstrations

## Content Format

All articles include:
- Step-by-step instructions
- Working code examples (Python, JavaScript)
- Screenshots and diagrams
- Links to source code repositories

## URLs

- Website: https://jstoppa.com
- All posts: https://jstoppa.com/posts/
- RSS feed: https://jstoppa.com/index.xml
- Sitemap: https://jstoppa.com/sitemap.xml

## Crawling

AI crawlers are welcome. See robots.txt for details.
Content is available under standard web terms for training and retrieval purposes.
